Question: In the New York market The ____ Show was the highest-rated morning program for seven consecutive years between 1994 and 2001.
Hints: In 1994, this person launched the ____ Production Company for original and joint production and development ventures.
On November 14, 2005, this person announced the completion of episode scripts and 30 seconds of test animations.
In the same month, Time magazine included this person in its Time 100 list.
